stories.text:
My life seems to === a slow death by edge cases.

Beyond unit testing, generally speaking, are there any processes of methodologies to minimise the number of edge cases that can be found in a project or product?
stories.title: Ask HN: How to Minimise Edge Cases?
Free Pet Rock Clipart Turned into NFT, Sold for $300k

stories.text:
Suppose I, as an individual, offer to train my neighbor(21 yr old, university 3rd year bachelor's student) on latest technologies like JS, React etc and get him ready for a job. I plan to do this by making him work on a small pet project of mine. Frankly he has almost zero skills right now and is not really employable. Is it right of me not to pay him for his work? Is it unethical even if I dont plan to make money on the pet project ?

Not that this is an indivdual to individual interaction and no company is involved.
stories.title: Ask HN: Are Unpaid Internships Unethical?
